name: obsidian-livesync
description: obsidian-livesync is a self-hosted sync server for Obsidian vaults, enabling real-time collaboration across devices without cloud services. It supports encryption and conflict resolution.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Keep Obsidian vaults synchronized across desktop and mobile devices with automatic change detection

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Protect note content with client-side encryption before transmission to the sync server

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Run your own sync server to maintain complete ownership of note data without cloud dependencies

features.title: Version History
features.description: Access previous versions of notes to recover deleted content or review document evolution

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Choose which folders or files to synchronize per device for managing large vaults efficiently

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Work alongside other Obsidian plugins without interfering with community extensions or themes
